title: Can I join Force Recon, then go to the USMC Scout Sniper School? - Quora
tags: United States Marine Corps Force Reconnaissance

response.answer_text: First things first there hard charger. You don’t just “join” force recon or battalion recon. Recon BN as well as the force attachment is a vital information gathering group of Marines. They do carry out sniper missions from time to time but a appointment is required and then a tryout. Look at it like drill instructor school. No guarantee cause your lucky to be there in the first place. If you measure up and your KD range scores are high enough…..maybe ! But friend I’m telling you slow your roll and take it one step at a time. Good luck as I see it rich Smith

Can I join Force Recon, then go to the USMC Scout Sniper School (SSS)? Short answer: Yes Longer answer: Many FoRecon teams have a Scout / Sniper as a member of the team, by design. They might have attended SSS before joining FoRecon or after qualifying for FoRecon.
